title: The Works
description: Introducing the world of Beryl Cook - Plymouth Argyle footballers, drag artists, transvestites, sailors on the Hoe, fish and chip shops, Teddy boys, fat barmaids, and all manner of wicked goings on.'Wildly funny and painted with the most loving detail ... her way with bottoms, hands, bottles, newsprint and local vegetation is all her own.' - Alan Ross'Beryl Cook is the nicest thing to happen to British painting for years ... it makes me laugh out loud.' - Edward Lucie-Smith
author: Beryl Cook
